original_text: Then the son began to think about what he had done. He said to himself, “My father has many servants, and they have plenty of food to eat. They even have more food than they need. But I will die here because I do not have any food.
korean_text: 이에 스스로 돌이켜 이르되 내 아버지에게는 양식이 풍족한 품꾼이 얼마나 많은가 나는 여기서 주려 죽는구나

sentences.original_text: Then the son began to think
and they have plenty of food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 먹을 풍부한 음식이 있다

sentences.original_text: They even have more food than they need
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 필요 이상으로 더 많은 음식이 있다

sentences.original_text: because I do not have any food
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 나는 음식이 전혀 없기 때문이다
